formulas.name: CollaborationDescriptionFrmula
formulas.expression: LEFT((IF({!$Record.Agnostic__c}, "Agnostic; ", "") & IF({!$Record.AMD__c} , "Age-Related Macular Degeneration; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Autism__c} , "Autism; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Birdshot__c} , "Birdshot; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Cancer__c} , "Cancer; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Chronic_Liver_Disease__c} , "Chronic Liver Disease; ", "") & IF({!$Record.CAD__c} , "Coronary Artery Disease; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Diabetic_retinopathy__c} , "Diabetic Retinopathy; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Endometriosis__c} , "Endometriosis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Giant_Cell_Arteritis__c} , "Giant Cell Arteritis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Glaucoma__c} , "Glaucoma; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Hidradenitis__c} , "Hidradenitis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Keloids__c} , "Keloids; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Longevity__c} , "Longevity; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Lupus__c} , "Lupus; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Monogenic__c} , "Monogenic; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Multiple_Sclerosis__c} , "Multiple Sclerosis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Parkinson_s__c} , "Parkinson's; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Primary_Biliary_Cholangitis__c} , "Primary Biliary Cholangitis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Primary_Sclerosing_Cholangitis__c} , "Primary Sclerosing Cholangitis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Psoriasis__c} , "Psoriasis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension__c} , "Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Renal_Disease__c} , "Renal Disease; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Scleroderma__c} , "Scleroderma; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Stroke__c} , "Stroke; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Systemic_Lupus__c} , "Systemic Lupus; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Type_1_Diabetes__c} , "Type 1 Diabetes; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Vitiligo__c} , "Vitiligo; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Description_Other__c} , "Other; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Inflammatory_Bowel_Disease__c} , "Inflammatory Bowel Disease; ", "")), LEN(IF({!$Record.Agnostic__c}, "Agnostic; ", "") & IF({!$Record.AMD__c} , "Age-Related Macular Degeneration; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Autism__c} , "Autism; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Birdshot__c} , "Birdshot; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Cancer__c} , "Cancer; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Chronic_Liver_Disease__c} , "Chronic Liver Disease; ", "") & IF({!$Record.CAD__c} , "Coronary Artery Disease; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Diabetic_retinopathy__c} , "Diabetic Retinopathy; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Endometriosis__c} , "Endometriosis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Giant_Cell_Arteritis__c} , "Giant Cell Arteritis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Glaucoma__c} , "Glaucoma; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Hidradenitis__c} , "Hidradenitis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Keloids__c} , "Keloids; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Longevity__c} , "Longevity; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Lupus__c} , "Lupus; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Monogenic__c} , "Monogenic; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Multiple_Sclerosis__c} , "Multiple Sclerosis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Parkinson_s__c} , "Parkinson's;", "")& IF({!$Record.Primary_Biliary_Cholangitis__c} , "Primary Biliary Cholangitis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Primary_Sclerosing_Cholangitis__c} , "Primary Sclerosing Cholangitis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Psoriasis__c} , "Psoriasis;", "")& IF({!$Record.Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension__c} , "Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Renal_Disease__c} , "Renal Disease; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Scleroderma__c} , "Scleroderma; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Stroke__c} , "Stroke; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Systemic_Lupus__c} , "Systemic Lupus; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Type_1_Diabetes__c} , "Type 1 Diabetes; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Vitiligo__c} , "Vitiligo; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Description_Other__c} , "Other; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Inflammatory_Bowel_Disease__c} , "Inflammatory Bowel Disease; ", "")) )

formulas.name: scopeFormula
formulas.expression: LEFT((IF({!$Record.Whole_Exome_Sequencing__c}, "Whole Exome Sequencing; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Whole_Genome_Sequencing__c} , "Whole Genome Sequencing; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Genotyping__c} , "Genotyping; ", "") & IF({!$Record.HLA_Typing__c} , "HLA Typing; ", "") & IF({!$Record.RNA_Sequencing__c} , "RNA Sequencing; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Scope_Other__c} , "Other; ", "")), LEN(IF({!$Record.Whole_Exome_Sequencing__c}, "Whole Exome Sequencing; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Whole_Genome_Sequencing__c} , "Whole Genome Sequencing; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Genotyping__c} , "Genotyping; ", "") & IF({!$Record.HLA_Typing__c} , "HLA Typing; ", "") & IF({!$Record.RNA_Sequencing__c} , "RNA Sequencing; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Scope_Other__c} , "Other; ", ""))-2 )

formulas.name: tagTeamFormula
formulas.expression: LEFT((IF({!$Record.Neuro__c}, "Neuro; ", "") & IF({!$Record.All__c} , "Agnostic; ", "") & IF({!$Record.M_M__c} , "M&M; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Ophthal__c} , "Ophthal; ", "") & IF({!$Record.I_O__c} , "I/O; ", "")& IF({!$Record.I_I__c} , "I&I; ", "")& IF({!$Record.SD__c} , "SD; ", "")& IF({!$Record.FSP__c} , "FSP; ", "")& IF({!$Record.RGC_Other__c} , "Other; ", "")& IF({!$Record.CVD_F__c} , "CVD/F; ", "")), LEN(IF({!$Record.Neuro__c}, "Neuro; ", "") & IF({!$Record.All__c} , "Agnostic; ", "") & IF({!$Record.M_M__c} , "M&M; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Ophthal__c} , "Ophthal; ", "") & IF({!$Record.I_O__c} , "I/O; ", "")& IF({!$Record.I_I__c} , "I&I; ", "")& IF({!$Record.SD__c} , "SD; ", "")& IF({!$Record.FSP__c} , "FSP; ", "")& IF({!$Record.RGC_Other__c} , "Other; ", "")& IF({!$Record.CVD_F__c} , "CVD/F; ", ""))-2 )

formulas.name: tftBiologyFormula
formulas.expression: LEFT(( IF({!$Record.Agnostic_TFA_Biology__c} , "Agnostic; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Immune_Respiratory__c}, "Immune & Respiratory; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Infectious_Diseases__c} , "Infectious Diseases; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Neurosciences__c} , "Neurosciences; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Ophthalmology__c} , "Ophthalmology; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Oncology__c} , "Oncology; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Cardiovascular_Fibrosis__c} , "Cardiovascular/Fibrosis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Muscle_Metabolism__c} , "Muscle & Metabolism; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Skeletal_Diseases__c} , "Skeletal Diseases; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Aging__c} , "Aging; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Biology_Other__c} , "Other; ", "")), LEN( IF({!$Record.Agnostic_TFA_Biology__c} , "Agnostic; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Immune_Respiratory__c}, "Immune & Respiratory; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Infectious_Diseases__c} , "Infectious Diseases; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Neurosciences__c} , "Neurosciences; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Ophthalmology__c} , "Ophthalmology; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Oncology__c} , "Oncology; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Cardiovascular_Fibrosis__c} , "Cardiovascular/Fibrosis; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Muscle_Metabolism__c} , "Muscle & Metabolism; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Skeletal_Diseases__c} , "Skeletal Diseases; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Aging__c} , "Aging; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Biology_Other__c} , "Other; ", ""))-2 )

formulas.name: typeFormula
formulas.expression: LEFT((IF({!$Record.Phenotype_Specific__c}, "Phenotype-Specific; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Large_Population__c} , "Large Population; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Founder_Special_Population__c} , "Founder/Special Population; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Mendelian__c} , "Mendelian; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Other__c} , "Other; ", "")), LEN(IF({!$Record.Phenotype_Specific__c}, "Phenotype-Specific; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Large_Population__c} , "Large Population; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Founder_Special_Population__c} , "Founder/Special Population; ", "") & IF({!$Record.Mendelian__c} , "Mendelian; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Health_System__c}, "Health System; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Strategic_Initiatives__c} , "Strategic Initiatives; ", "")& IF({!$Record.Other__c} , "Other; ", ""))-2 )
